name: Sweet Digger
description:
CONTROLS
Use WASD or ARROWS to drive, dig and fly. Use the MOUSE to use items. Try to avoid underground creatures.

GAMEPLAY
Something weird is happening with the planet »HugeCookie5#1 – T«. We have lost almost all communication with our outposts there. You have been assigned on a mission to investigate. You will be deployed in one of our still active outposts. There are a few crucial buildings still operating out there.  There are more than 40 different mineral ores inside the planet that you can pick up and exchange for gold.
We have to warn you, the path to the center won't be an easy one, therefore we suggest you equip yourself with as many items and upgrades as you can before you start the journey of exploring the deeper parts of the planet. Our scans have shown us a huge amount of unknown activity inside the planet, so be aware at all times. 

Your goal is to mine your way down to the center of the planet and figure out what is causing that massive gravity disturbance in the core. We have assigned you a companion to help you with your mission

How fast can you reach the center? 
How many different ores can you find? 
How long can you survive?

CREDITS
Game made by us in early 2018.
